column1:
send(to, from, count)
    register short *to, *from;
    register count;
    {
    	register n=(count+7)/8;
    	switch(count%8){
    	case 0:	do{	*to = *from++;
    	case 7:		*to = *from++;
    	case 6:		*to = *from++;
    	case 5:		*to = *from++;
    	case 4:		*to = *from++;
    	case 3:		*to = *from++;
    	case 2:		*to = *from++;
    	case 1:		*to = *from++;
    		}while(--n>0);
    	}
    }
